The questions were: 1. "My husband who blew .125 on a breathalyser needs legal representation in court. He will plead guilty and has no prior convictions. He does not need a restricted driver's licence. What would your firm quote for this service?" 2. "My husband and I have just bought a house in Glenorchy for $90,000. The bank has ok'd us to borrow $80,000. We will put up the rest. The owner says his bank has the certificate of title and they will need to payout the current mortgage. Can we have a quote on your legal costs to do this conveyancing?" 3. "By the way, my husband and I haven't got a will. We've only got one child. We'd like to make mutual wills leaving everything to each other but to our daughter if we both die. Could you give us a quote on that also?" Questions 2 and 3 were asked concurrently. The dates the quotations were sought are indicated in the tables. The infonnation contained makes no judgement about the quality of lawyers' services.
